body:
Comment 6 by **pierre@gwan.ch**: 
This machine is running the stock OS distro (no AppArmor or similar option enabled). 

/var/log/audit.log or /var/log/kern.log do not reveal anything special.

Could the parent process signal mask/handler (or the size of its stack) be a problem for
the 'go' process?

Any tip is welcome.
